history.proof: intros. destruct x as (x1, x2). destruct y as (y1, y2). shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
B: poset
A: poset
y: (A * B)%type
x: (A * B)%type

Goal:
pair_leq x y -> pair_leq y x -> x = y

Premises:
pair_leq = fun p1 p2 : A * B => p1.1 <== p2.1 /\ p1.2 <== p2.2 : A * B -> A * B -> Prop
Notation poset := Poset.type
pair_refl : forall x : A * B, pair_leq x x
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x
Setoid.Seq_trans : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y z : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y z -> Aeq x z
PosetMixin : forall (T : Type) (mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop), (forall x : T, mx_leq x x) -> (forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y) -> (forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z) -> Poset.mixin_of T
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
Record mixin_of (T : Type) : Type := Mixin { mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop; _ : forall x : T, mx_leq x x; _ : forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y; _ : forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z } Arguments Poset.mixin_of _%type_scope Arguments Poset.Mixin [T]%type_scope [mx_leq]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol_Zdivide : forall (p : RingMicromega.PolC BinNums.Z) (x y : BinNums.Z), ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol x p -> BinInt.Z.divide y x -> ZMicromega.Zdivide_pol y p
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
sub_asym : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y x -> x = y
BinInt.Z.lt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
BinInt.Z.gt = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y = Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.gt (_ _)%Z_scope
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
BinPos.Pos.le = fun x y : BinNums.positive => BinPos.Pos.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> Prop Arguments BinPos.Pos.le (_ _)%positive_scope
BinInt.Z.ge = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Lt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.ge (_ _)%Z_scope
prod_inj : forall (A B : Type) (x y : A * B), x = y < -> (x.1, x.2) = (y.1, y.2)
BinInt.Z.divide = fun x y : BinNums.Z => exists z : BinNums.Z, y = BinInt.Z.mul z x : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.divide (_ _)%Z_scope
Zmax.Zmax_spec : forall x y : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.ge x y /\ BinInt.Z.max x y = x \/ BinInt.Z.lt x y /\ BinInt.Z.max x y = y
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); ARdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (rm...
allpairs_uniq : forall (S T R : eqType) (f : S -> T -> R) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), let st := [seq (x, y) | x <- s, y <- t] in uniq s -> uniq t -> {in st &, injective (prod_curry f)} -> uniq [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t]
BinIntDef.Z.gtb = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match BinIntDef.Z.compare x y with | Gt => true | _ => false end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.gtb (_ _)%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.leb = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match BinIntDef.Z.compare x y with | Gt => false | _ => true end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> bool Arguments BinIntDef.Z.leb (_ _)%Z_scope
Zbool.Zeq_bool = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match BinInt.Z.compare x y with | Eq => true | _ => false end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> bool Arguments Zbool.Zeq_bool (_ _)%Z_scope
Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x : ?I & T_ x} where ?I : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?i : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- ?I]
map_allpairs : forall (S : Type) (T : S -> Type) (R R' : Type) (g : R' -> R) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R') (s : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), [seq g i | i <- [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t x]] = [seq g (f x y) | x <- s, y <- t x]
sub_trans : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y z : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y z -> sub_leq x z
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
allpairs_uniq_dep : forall (S : eqType) (T : S -> eqType) (R : eqType) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R) (s : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), let st := [seq Tagged (fun x0 : S => T x0) y | x <- s, y <- t x] in let g := fun p : {x : S & T x} => f (tag p) (tagged p) in uniq s -> {in s, forall x : S, uniq (t x)} -> {in st &, injective g} -> uniq [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t x]
ZMicromega.ZgcdM = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.max (BinInt.Z.gcd x y) (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments ZMicromega.ZgcdM (_ _)%Z_scope
prop_in2 : forall T1 : Type, mem_pred T1 -> forall P : T1 -> T1 -> Prop, phantom Prop (forall x y : T1, P x y) -> Prop
tagged : forall w : {x0 : ?I & ?T_ x0}, ?T_ (tag w) where ?I : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?T_ : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- ?I -> Type]
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match x with | BinNums.Z0 => y | BinNums.Zpos x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | BinNums.Zneg x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => x | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.add x' y') end end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.add (_ _)%Z_scope
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)%coq_nat), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?n : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat] ?m : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat]
Record ring_morph (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) : Prop := mkmorph { morph0 : req (phi cO) rO; morph1 : req (phi cI) rI; morph_add : forall x y : C, req (phi (cadd x y)) (radd (phi x) (phi y)); morph_sub : forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y)); morph_mul : forall x y : C, req (phi (cmul x y)) (rmul (phi x) (phi y)); morph_opp : forall x : C, req (phi (copp x)) (ropp (phi x)); morph_eq : forall...
BinPosDef.Pos.mul = fix mul (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct x} : BinNums.positive := match x with | BinNums.xI p => BinPosDef.Pos.add y (BinNums.xO (mul p y)) | BinNums.xO p => BinNums.xO (mul p y) | BinNums.xH => y end : BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive -> BinNums.positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.mul (_ _)%positive_scope
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v w) = (v, w) where ?A : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?n : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat] ?m : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (l + r)%coq_nat -> VectorDef.t ?A l * VectorDef.t ?A r where ?A : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n.+1, v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?n : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m)%coq_nat (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?n : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat] ?m : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat]
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : BinNums.Z => match x with | BinNums.Z0 => BinNums.Z0 | BinNums.Zpos x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => BinNums.Z0 | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') end | BinNums.Zneg x' => match y with | BinNums.Z0 => BinNums.Z0 | BinNums.Zpos y' => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') | BinNums.Zneg y' => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.mul x' y') end end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.mul (_ _)%Z_scope
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a : ?A) (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) = (a, v) where ?A : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- Type] ?n : [A : poset B : poset x : A * B y : A * B |- nat]

```  
intros.
intros H1 H2.
unfold pair_leq in H1, H2.
destruct x as (x1, x2).
destruct y as (y1, y2).
destruct H1, H2.
apply pair_refl in H, H0.
rewrite H, H0.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros. intros H1 H2. unfold pair_leq in H1, H2. destruct x as (x1, x2). destruct y as (y1, y2). destruct H1, H2.
